page.title: 07The Police In Pencoed
page.content: The Police station in Pencoed is in Heol-y-Groes Road. There are two police men there, P.C.Hammond and P.C.Evans. P.C. Bill Smith, a police man who has just left Pencoed Police station, was voted the best community police man in South Wales. P.C.Hammond does a safe cycling course in schools around Pencoed. The Police station in Pencoed is only a sub police station. The police in Pencoed are raising a fund to build a youth club in Pencoed and try to keep the children from breaking the law. The crime rate in Pencoed is increasing: more chiidren in Pencoed are breaking the law than adults.
